'''Courtney Swanson''' is the mother of [[Will Swanson]], a patient at [[Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital]].

==History==
Courtney was concerned about the doctors removing all of his tumors in one surgery, but they informed her that it was necessary, that if they didn't, the cancer would just continue to grow, as it was very aggressive.

When they were unable to remove all the tumors, she was upset and asked what that meant for Will.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
She has one son, Will, who has stage four cancer.
